name: Wall Push Ups
instruction: Stand at about two feet from a wall. Extend your arms straight out in front of you, your palms should touch the wall surface at about shoulder-level height and shoulder-width apart. Bend your elbows and lean your body toward the wall till your face almost touches it. Push back to the starting position. Repeat until the set is complete.
hints: On the way back to the starting position, push the wall away until your arms are completely straight. Breathe in while you are lowering yourself and Exhale as you begin to push off the wall.
